title: FS: N566 Newsboy Ward -Arms Crossed SGC 50
author: WillowGrove

posts.post_title: FS: N566 Newsboy Ward -Arms Crossed SGC 50
posts.post_content:
Ironically I have been meaning to post my John Montgomery Ward Newsboy so I may as well do it while there is a huge wave of interest in his Newsboy cards.  (I am exaggerating).

This is considered the scarcer pose and this card has not been offered publicly in years.  Strong image.  Special card.

$5500 obo.

Please pm.  Hope he goes to a good home.

Thanks for looking.  

-peter
That is a great example.  I'm surprised no one has jumped on it.

Thank you guys!

Anyone interested before it goes back into the PC?

Thank you.

peter
I don’t collect 19th century, but it’s hard for me to believe this still hasn’t sold yet!
